function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Isolation and use of HCoV-229E in PCR","Impact":"Potential spread of HCoV-229E if not handled properly","Mitigation":"Strict biosafety protocols and containment measures","Technologies":"Biosafety cabinets, personal protective equipment","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management"},{"Description":"Sanger sequencing analysis","Impact":"Risk of contamination and spread of sequenced virus","Mitigation":"Strict laboratory hygiene, use of dedicated equipment, and decontamination procedures","Technologies":"Sequencing machines, decontamination equipment","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management"},{"Description":"Replication studies with SARS-CoV-2 positive wastewater","Impact":"Potential release of replication-competent SARS-CoV-2 viruses","Mitigation":"Strict containment measures, use of high-level biosafety facilities, and proper disposal procedures","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, biohazard bags, autoclaves","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management"}]}
